item.description:
Hey Guys and Gals,

I hope that everyone is well and enjoying this vastly improved weather. After chatting with a few people I have narrowed the next meeting's topic list down to the following items:

1. Podcasts – Do people listen? What are people’s favorites? Let's share!

2. My experiences with Linux – Installation and basics for new users using Ubuntu. I will bring some nice cheat sheets to get non-Linux users up and going.

3. What is happening on Slashdot, Reddit and Digg these days. There is always some interesting news that we can discuss.

I look forward to hopefully seeing some new faces and definitely the old ones.

As always please do not hesitate to contact me with any comments or questions.

Best regards,
John

I saw that "Other Side Cafe" on Newbury received some good comments on meetup.com I am interested to see if it is a good meeting place.

group.name: The Boston Computing Review Meetup Group

item.name: Podcasts, Linux and News
